column1: #Text=I 'll have to try a different approach .
#Text=" Aang says : " You think you 're untouchable , do n't you , Mr. Fire Lord ?
#Text=" Momo says : " Boy , you are really starting to lose it , kid .
#Text=" Aang says : " Momo , did you hear something ?
#Text=" Momo says : " No , but I said something .
#Text=You , my friend , are just a few plums short of a fruit pie .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's more like it .
#Text=I 'm so tired that for a second there , I imagined you were talking to me .
#Text=We 're all starting to get a little worried about you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 've been awake too long .
#Text=" Toph says : " And you 're acting downright weird .
#Text=" Appa says : " You 've got to take care of yourself .
#Text=You ca n't go on like this .
#Text=" Aang says : " Look , I appreciate what you guys are saying , but the stress and the nightmares .
#Text=Staying awake is the best way for me to deal with it .
#Text=" Appa says : " Hey , who asked you ?
#Text=" Aang says : " You guys , come on .
#Text=I am sick of this guy always mouthing me and telling me what to do !
#Text=" Momo says : " Oh , you do n't like it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka , what do we do ?
#Text=" Pathik says : " Chakras , chakras , everybody loves chakras .
#Text=" Aang says : " I just need to jump in a cold waterfall !
